title: Geepas 1000W Single Hot Plate Precise Table Top Cooking – Cast Iron Heating Plate - Portable Electric Hob Single Burner with Adjustable Thermostat for Home Kitchen Camping & Caravan Cooking, Compact
features: CAST IRON, WORKS WITH MULTIPLE COOKWARE’S - This 1000W hot plate has high quality and durable cast iron heating element for quick and sustained heating with solid plate of 155mm. Works with multiple flat cooking utensils such as frying pans, steak plates, stone pots, aluminium cooking utensils, stainless steel cooking utensils, glass cooking utensils and ceramic cooking utensils.

THERMOSTATIC ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROLS: The latest hot plate is 1000W high power with 5 levels of precise temperature control; Make heating much easier - With thermostatic control from simmering to boiling, heating has never been more easy or simple. Meet all your cooking needs such as to keep warm, boil water, cook pastas or steaks etc. Perfect for party, kitchen renovation, camping, Rv or dormitory or even brought to the campsite, it can provide you with cooking convenience.

COMPACT & PORTABLE, NON-SLIP RUBBER FEET: 1000W heating power can meet your daily cooking needs. For example, frying steak, cooking pasta, boiling water, making thick soup and vegetables and more, making various delicious foods easily. This hot plate is not only compact for easy storage, but also portable. It comes with non-slip rubber feet to ensure the unit will be firmly in place during operation and durable enough to withstand frequent use.

OVERHEAT PROTECTION, INDICATOR LIGHT - This safety feature avoids danger when the temperature of the hot plate goes too high. The indicator light turns off immediately and when temperature is back to normal, it turns back on and heating resumes.

ALTERNATIVE USES: Highly versatile, table-top cast iron hob with multi-cooking functions makes it ideal for camping, holiday homes, parties, events, student accommodation, or as an extra appliance in a busy kitchen. Use it for Warming, Cooking, Boiling, Frying, Simmering, and much more.
